member.name: T:Owin.Metrics.Middleware.ActiveRequestCounterMiddleware
member.summary: Owin middleware that counts the number of active requests.

member.name: T:Owin.Metrics.OwinMetrics
member.summary: Helper class to register OWIN Metrics

member.name: M:Owin.Metrics.OwinMetrics.WithOwin(Metrics.MetricsConfig,System.Action{System.Object})
member.summary: Add Metrics Middleware to the Owin pipeline. Sample: Metric.Config.WithOwin( m => app.Use(m)) Where app is the IAppBuilder
member.param: Action used to register middleware. This should generally be app.Use(middleware)

member.name: M:Owin.Metrics.OwinMetrics.WithOwin(Metrics.MetricsConfig,System.Action{System.Object},System.Action{Owin.Metrics.OwinMetricsConfig})
member.summary: Add Metrics Middleware to the Owin pipeline. Sample: Metric.Config.WithOwin( m => app.Use(m)) Where app is the IAppBuilder
member.param: Action used to register middleware. This should generally be app.Use(middleware)
Action used to configure Owin metrics.

member.name: M:Owin.Metrics.OwinMetricsConfig.WithRequestMetricsConfig(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex[],System.String)
member.summary: Register all predefined metrics.
member.param: Name of the metrics context where to register the metrics.

member.name: M:Owin.Metrics.OwinMetricsConfig.WithRequestMetricsConfig(System.Action{Owin.Metrics.OwinRequestMetricsConfig},System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex[],System.String)
member.summary: Configure which Owin metrics to be registered.
member.param: Action used to configure Owin metrics.
Name of the metrics context where to register the metrics.

member.name: M:Owin.Metrics.OwinMetricsConfig.WithMetricsEndpoint
member.summary: Expose Owin metrics endpoint

member.name: M:Owin.Metrics.OwinMetricsConfig.WithMetricsEndpoint(System.Action{Owin.Metrics.OwinMetricsEndpointConfig})
member.summary: Configure Owin metrics endpoint.
member.param: Action used to configure the Owin Metrics endpoint.

member.name: P:Owin.Metrics.OwinMetricsEndpointConfig.MetricsEndpointEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [metrics endpoint enabled].
member.value: true if [metrics endpoint enabled]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Owin.Metrics.OwinMetricsEndpointConfig.MetricsEndpointName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the metrics endpoint.
member.value: The name of the metrics endpoint.

member.name: P:Owin.Metrics.OwinMetricsEndpointConfig.MetricsJsonEndpointEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [metrics json endpoint enabled].
member.value: true if [metrics json endpoint enabled]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Owin.Metrics.OwinMetricsEndpointConfig.MetricsJsonEndpointName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the metrics json endpoint.
member.value: The name of the metrics json endpoint.

member.name: P:Owin.Metrics.OwinMetricsEndpointConfig.MetricsTextEndpointEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [metrics text endpoint enabled].
member.value: true if [metrics text endpoint enabled]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Owin.Metrics.OwinMetricsEndpointConfig.MetricsTextEndpointName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the metrics text endpoint.
member.value: The name of the metrics text endpoint.

member.name: P:Owin.Metrics.OwinMetricsEndpointConfig.MetricsHealthEndpointEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [metrics health endpoint enabled].

member.name: P:Owin.Metrics.OwinMetricsEndpointConfig.MetricsHealthEndpointName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the metrics health endpoint.
member.value: The name of the metrics health endpoint.

member.name: P:Owin.Metrics.OwinMetricsEndpointConfig.MetricsPingEndpointEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [metrics ping endpoint enabled].

member.name: M:Owin.Metrics.OwinMetricsEndpointConfig.MetricsEndpoint(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Configures the metrics endpoint

member.name: M:Owin.Metrics.OwinMetricsEndpointConfig.MetricsJsonEndpoint(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Configures the json endpoint which returns metrics as a json result

member.name: M:Owin.Metrics.OwinMetricsEndpointConfig.MetricsTextEndpoint(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Configures the text endpoint which returns metrics as human readable text

member.name: M:Owin.Metrics.OwinMetricsEndpointConfig.MetricsHealthEndpoint(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Configures the health endpoint which returns health status's in json format.

member.name: M:Owin.Metrics.OwinMetricsEndpointConfig.MetricsPingEndpoint(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Configures the ping endpoint.

member.name: M:Owin.Metrics.OwinRequestMetricsConfig.WithAllOwinMetrics
member.summary: Configure global OWIN Metrics. Available global metrics are: Request Timer, Active Requests Counter, Error Meter
member.returns: This instance to allow chaining of the configuration.

member.name: M:Owin.Metrics.OwinRequestMetricsConfig.WithRequestTimer(System.String)
member.summary: Registers a Timer metric named "Owin.Requests" that records how many requests per second are handled and also keeps a histogram of the request duration.

member.name: M:Owin.Metrics.OwinRequestMetricsConfig.WithActiveRequestCounter(System.String)
member.summary: Registers a Counter metric named "Owin.ActiveRequests" that shows the current number of active requests

member.name: M:Owin.Metrics.OwinRequestMetricsConfig.WithPostAndPutRequestSizeHistogram(System.String)
member.summary: Register a Histogram metric named "Owin.PostAndPutRequestsSize" on the size of the POST and PUT requests

member.name: M:Owin.Metrics.OwinRequestMetricsConfig.WithTimerForEachRequest
member.summary: Registers a timer for each request. Timer is created based on route and will be named: Owin.{HTTP_METHOD_NAME} [{ROUTE_PATH}]

member.name: M:Owin.Metrics.OwinRequestMetricsConfig.WithErrorsMeter(System.String)
member.summary: Registers a Meter metric named "Owin.Errors" that records the rate at witch unhanded errors occurred while processing Nancy requests.
